name: Michael Smith
description: Award-winning chef and author known for his focus on sustainable and local ingredients.
chef_bio: Michael Smith is a Canadian chef, cookbook author, and television host. He is best known for his focus on using sustainable and locally sourced ingredients, and his commitment to promoting healthy eating.

recipes.name: Nova Scotia Lobster Salad
recipes.cooking_method: 1. In a large bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise and lemon juice. 2. Add the lobster meat, celery, and red onion, and stir gently to combine. 3. Chill for at least 30 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Quinoa and Kale Salad
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Rinse the quinoa in a fine mesh strainer under cold water. 2. In a medium saucepan, bring the quinoa and water to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, until the water is absorbed and the quinoa is tender. 3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, kale, parsley, and feta cheese. 4. Toss to combine and serve.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Citrus Salsa
ingredients: 1 jalapeño pepper, seeded and finely chopped
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 2. Rub salmon fillets with olive oil and season with paprika, garlic powder, and salt. 3. Grill salmon for 5-7 minutes per side, until cooked through. 4. In a medium bowl, combine the orange, grapefruit, cilantro, and jalapeño pepper. 5. Serve the grilled salmon with the citrus salsa on top.
